title: Homework on the go.
comment: I will start using this when I have homework due and I have no laptop

title: Buggy and limited, but has potential
comment: I love Sage and Sage Cloud, but Sage for Android just has too many show stopping bugs and lacks key features. Sage instantly crashes or reloads the document whenever I rotate my screen. Also lacks any kind of import/export so that you can work on a different device or edit a Sage file from your desktop on the go. Still, it's like having a portable Wolfram Mathematica, so it's pretty cool.

title: Getting better
comment: Had a crash on first creation of a cell but after that it was impressive.

title: Quick calc on the move
comment: Good for mathematical calculations on the move. A similar app for cloud.sagemath would be great for more detailed stuff.

title: Useless
comment: Does nothing but show a loading bar. Less than worthless.

title: great app but server broken?
comment: used Sage on Android for some computations in number Theory.  Halas since some days the server does not react...A true pity,  because Sage on desktop is a superb program.

title: Broken?
comment: Doesn't seem to do anything when 'run' is pressed
Glad to see the crashing on use of plot solved. Unfortunately the crashes still happen randomly.
Has crashed any time I try to plot something. I like the idea of a sage android app a lot, so I hope it gets a tune-up.

title: Misrepresented. Runs on their servers only?
comment: It doesn't ask for network permission, but won't add 1+1 if network is disabled. Apparently does not run locally. As near as I can tell, you can't back your files up locally either unless you cut and paste. Crashes *any* time plot is called, etc. Last crash lost a couple hours of work and all the examples.

comment: Thank you !!

title: Great app
comment: Love the new version, very well done
Upon executing any script: "The application Sage has stopped unexpectedly. Please try again". This is on Motorola phone MB525 & Android 2.1-update1.

title: Good work but needs some more
comment: Has some functionality missing. Group option for add cell could benefit from a pull-down of predefined groups. Examples import from the Internet. Sage code completion suggestions. Linking to sage cloud account. Custom addition of inserts for blocks I frequently use. Programming keyboard similar to other math apps. Not my go to math app yet.  Update: Empty group deletion is a good idea and works. Hackers keyboard is OK, though not a good as some other specialized proprietary math app keyboards for quick work
Thanks for your feedback. Hacker's Keyboard app is highly recommended. Groups are deleted automatically if no cells exist in that group, just restart.

title: They fixed it
comment: Its all working good now. Thank you for listening! Such an amazing app.

title: Force Closes,

title: Promising Software
comment: It crashes when attempting to run anything on Nexus 5 Android 4.4. The capability to specify a custom Sage server to access would also be wonderful. This software has great potential!

title: Crashes

title: Very well thought out.
comment: Bringing Sage to mobile is awesome. I was also super impressed by the well thought-out interface. A hotkey for common flow-control constructs is an especially great idea.
